The application requires permission to upload contacts to the server,after permission your contacts will be used

1.To improve number search

2.For better spam detector performance

3.To synchronize contacts
In this case, you will not be able to use the application,\nwould you like to close the application?
Without permission, the application will not identify incoming calls!
Permission required to identify incoming calls!
For this feature to work properly, you must turn off battery saver!
internet required for add new Organization
For the application to work correctly, disable battery optimization

1. Displaying the Company Number in the Database If you want your company number to be easily searchable by other users of the application, you can add your company's information to our "Organizations Database" for adding listings. To do this, please click on: Add Your Company.


2. Principle of Application Operation The "MBase" application does not require access to your GPS coordinates, SMS messages, or microphone recording function. The application does not store any GPS coordinates, nor does it perform any call recording, message reading, viewing, or modification. The application does not store any personal information about your contacts or messaging history on your device. Therefore, it does not request access to mobile devices for these services.


4. Incoming and Outgoing Calls In case you enable the "Number Identifier" function in the application, it automatically performs a search for the incoming and outgoing calls in the database and retrieves the results. In the event that the application does not have internet access, it searches for the number's owner in the databases available on your phone. The number will be automatically searched in the database, and in the case of a match, the application will display the results, namely the names associated with that number in the application's other users' mobile devices.


5. Use of Contacts The "MBase" application uses the contacts stored on your mobile device with your permission and shares them with the application's users. This means that the application only processes your contacts information after obtaining your consent. By sending your contacts, you confirm that you have legal authority over the personal information, and you grant the right to process, store, and transfer the information to the application's servers located in the United States, in compliance with the laws and regulations on personal data protection.


6. Retrieving Mobile/Phone Numbers from the Application's Database In case you are searching for your mobile/phone number within the application and wish to retrieve its associated name from the application or prefer that your number is not searchable within the application, you can reach out to us via Facebook Messenger or through the website. After the verification process to ensure that this number is genuinely yours, we will either remove the number or
